description: Multipurpose cabinet unit can be used as book case, crockery unit or storage cabinet to organize the stuffs systematically. This cabinet can be used all over the home, especially in dinning or living room. It will be just perfect to use for storage purposes such as for keeping books and stationary items as well as for decorative purpose to arrange flowers vases and other home decor items. L x B x H =40 x 23 x 100 cm
